name: The Witch and the Wisp
description:
The Witch and the Wisp was created during a 48-hour game jam at the University of Southern California.

Lead Engineer: Drew Perlman

Lead Designer: Dalton Chancellor

Art & Music: Carys Gooi

Art & Design: Selah Wright

Art: Bethany Lai

Design: Paiam Moghaddam

Engineering: Gabriel Lacayo

Engineering: Nathan Shanjkala

Engineering: Bram Lim
